titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 3194) making appropriations for the government of the District of Columbia and other activities chargeable in whole or in part against revenues of said District for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2000, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 106-481, by Mr. Linder.

Rule provides for consideration of the conference report to H.R. 3194 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit. Waives points of order against the conference report and against its consideration. Provides that upon adoption of the conference report, the House shall be considered to have adopted a concurrent resolution that resolves that the enrolled copy of H.R. 2466, shall not be presented to the President, to the end that the bill be, and is hereby, laid on the table.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 163.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 386.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 226 - 204 (Roll no. 608).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 11/17/1999--Introduced. Waives points of order against the consideration of the conference report on H.R. 3194 (District of Columbia appropriations).
